data.name: The Mysterious Cat Tower
data.detailed_description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1706960/Cat_Tower/

Cat Tower is a deckbuilding RPG with a lot of focus on character building. The game set in a small brazillian city that is in verge of collapsing after an ominous tower appears beside it overnight.

Features

  • A wide array of different spell cards to suit different strategies and styles of play
  • Several talents with effects that range from slight advantages to effects that can fuck over everyone including yourself
  • Six basic attributes that can help you either complement your play or cover your weaknesses
  • Various different allies, all of which can be strengthened and upgraded.
  • Free ability to reset your entire character at any point in the game
  • Banger ass soundtrack
  • Impactful side-quests that can change the destiny of the whole world
  • Copious amounts of ass and titties

data.short_description: A J/W/GRPG with card-based combat. Find spell cards to add to your deck, pick impactful talents, tune your attributes, acquire powerful allies, freely reset your build and try something new. Find your own way to play as you experience the harsh life of the strongest pussy in Brazil.
